name: FOG - Battle Royale
description:
An enchanted fog has descended onto once peaceful lands, and only the best of the best will be able to escape and survive.

A Mobile Legend
The battle royale genre has already become legendary, winning millions of fans, including those using mobile devices. We have collected the best features of MOBA games (MOBA stands for Multiplayer Online Battle Arena), added an RPG component, and served the whole thing up under the most delicious fantasy ambiance sauce.

Fast-moving PvPBattles and Survival
Are you ready for a challenge? Join fast-paced and dynamic battles unfolding in the arena that accommodates 30 players for action fights. Acquire gear, stalk other players or hide from them, but, most importantly, survive until the end; otherwise, you will be reduced to turning into a part of the deadly fog.

Medieval Times in All Their Glory
Bows, sword, spears, and all other weapons from the most fascinating era: what else do you need for complete immersion? Well, magic, of course! Besides, there are potions that will help you survive, all sorts of monsters and creatures that you will confront, and, of course, the fog that brings perdition.

Are you ready? Then see you in FOG!

Please note: the game is currently in the open beta phase, and it is being actively developed.
